70010000091935.description:
Gearheads, buckle up! Mechanic Supermarket Simulator throws you headfirst into the exciting world of automotive retail. Here, you’ll call the shots, crafting a one-stop shop for car enthusiasts and building a thriving automotive empire.

Features:
- Build Your Dream Auto Oasis: Design your ideal car care haven. Customize the layout, stock shelves with everything from everyday maintenance supplies to high-performance upgrades, and become the ultimate inventory master – predict customer demand, keep shelves full, and avoid stockouts.
- Expand Your Automotive Empire: Start small and grow your reputation! Watch your local parts store blossom into a regional powerhouse, attracting customers with an ever-expanding selection of parts and the latest automotive technology.
- Unlock New Parts & Licenses: Stay ahead of the curve by offering the latest innovations in the industry. Secure licenses for cutting-edge parts, from hybrid engine components to autonomous vehicle systems.
- Master the Marketplace: Become a retail shark! Adapt your pricing strategies to stay competitive, respond to changing customer demands, and keep your customers happy with excellent service that caters to every need, from routine maintenance to complex repairs.

Mechanic Supermarket Simulator offers a unique blend of business simulation and car customization, putting you in the driver’s seat of your automotive retail destiny. Are you ready to build a one-stop shop that keeps every engine purring?
70010000091935.intro: Master the art of repairs and build a mechanical empire!
70010000091935.name: Mechanic Supermarket Simulator

70070000026986.description:
West Escape throws you into a chaotic frontier where the law is on your tail and alien invaders are wreaking havoc. As a fugitive desperate to reunite with your lost love, you'll need to collect scrap, upgrade your gear, and face off against relentless extraterrestrial threats.

Features:
- Premium Equipment: Equip to gain extra tool and weapon damage, twice the loot from expeditions and reduced crafting time!
- Rare Gear and more: Obtain rare and uncommon equipment to boost your power level!
- Bonus currency: Get 2000 gems and spend them to progress even faster!
- High-Energy Combat: Dodge enemy attacks and blast aliens with powerful weapons like revolvers and shotguns.
- Gear Upgrades: Collect scrap and loot to upgrade weapons and gear, boosting stats like speed and damage.
- Explosive Expeditions: Venture into dangerous areas to uncover new gear, resources, and challenges.
- Wild West Meets Sci-Fi: Experience a unique fusion of classic Western adventure and alien invasion chaos.
- Fast-Paced Progression: Keep moving forward with nonstop action, upgrades, and intense encounters.

Fast-paced combat keeps you on your toes—dodge deadly attacks and strike back with revolvers, shotguns, and more. Every battle and upgrade brings you one step closer to freedom and the ultimate showdown in this explosive mix of Wild West grit and sci-fi action.

Saddle up, lock and load—freedom and love are waiting on the other side of this alien-infested frontier!
70070000026986.intro: Outrun the law, blast aliens, and fight for love in the wildest ride through the Wild West!
70070000026986.name: West Escape: Complete Edition

70010000081916.description:
You're a prisoner in a cell. You have to escape. But is that really the goal? Centum appears to be a point-and-click adventure, but beneath the surface is something altogether different.

Unreliable Narrator: Centum challenges traditional gaming conventions by weaving an intricate narrative where reality is as fluid as the mind of its narrator.

Mind-bending Gameplay: Navigate a series of daunting scenarios, each shrouded in uncertainty and enigma. Every click and decision is remembered, forcing you to grapple with the unreliable nature of the narrator's hints and guidance.

Shape the Story: There is no singular protagonist in Centum; instead, players shape the behavior of an artificial intelligence through their choices, guiding it towards different outcomes and experiences.

Dynamic Dialogue System: Engage in conversations that influence the characters' ego states and alter the course of the narrative.

Multiple Endings: With hidden variables persisting between game runs, each playthrough offers new twists, ensuring that no two experiences are alike.

Question Reality: Centum speaks of themes that challenge players to question not only the game's reality but also their own perceptions and beliefs
70010000081916.name: Centum

70010000086160.description: The Phantom is an arcade-style beat-em-up coming to PC and consoles. Play as The Phantom or his partner, Diana Palmer, in this 14-level adventure. The feared pirates of the Singh Brotherhood are battling for power and threatening The Phantom’s legacy, and it’s up to you to stop them. Use your hand-to-hand fighting skills and trusty weapons to dispatch this evil, and call in assistance from your animal friends Fraka the falcon and Devil the wolf. The Phantom features a brand-new story approved by King Features. Experience this canon addition through full-screen cut scenes and captivating in-game visuals, hand-illustrated and animated frame-by-frame by seasoned comic book artists and Art Of Play’s dedicated in-house 2D creative team.
70010000086160.intro: Comics’ very first costumed hero has arrived on Nintendo Switch™ with only his physical strength, skill with weapons and fearsome reputation to fight crime!
70010000086160.name: The Phantom

70010000089931.description:
Take the role of Mr. Robot who has been trapped in a highly dangerous and rather fruity dimension called the Neon Dunjun. The only way to survive is to collect fruits which explode on contact, destroying any enemies in their blast radius, helping Mr. Robot to cheat death for a few more moments. To assist him further, exploding fruits set off a chain reaction, causing other fruit to explode - filling the screen with destruction and more importantly, POINTS!

3D Don’t Die Mr. Robot is a reboot of the 2D cult hit with a whole new dimension of delights! There's remix mode with hand-made challenges, arcade mode with its high-scoring but mind-melting purity and lime attack mode with, well... limes! Top-down arena combat has never been more juicy!

Features:

• Enjoy frantic arcade-style arena gameplay, now in colorful 3D!
• Dodge enemies and collect explosive fruits to survive.
• Use coins you’ve collected across game modes to unlock shades, hats, shoes and more!
• Master an addictive scoring system and challenge online leaderboards.
• Get into the groove with a pulse-pounding soundtrack!
70010000089931.intro: Survive a fruity dimension of destruction in fast-paced arcade-style collect’em up style!
70010000089931.name: 3D Don't Die Mr. Robot

70010000090692.description:
1922. Miss Mulligatawney's School for Promising Girls is one of the best boarding schools in England. You are Verity Amersham, here on a scholarship - and today you're going to be expelled for attempted murder. 

From the creators of Overboard! and A Highland Song comes a highly replayable detective game with an wicked twist. Can you escape expulsion through fair means - or foul? Can you find the culprit - or someone else to take the blame?

GAMEPLAY

Gossip, lie, steal, manipulate - but don't get caught!

* Navigate the school day, talk to other characters, sneak around - and try not to get expelled!
* Your actions will affect other characters, who remember everything they see and hear.
* Everyone here has secrets - students and teachers alike. Remember, knowledge is power.
* Unique morality system: the more EVIL you are, the more choices you'll have...

DYNAMIC NARRATIVE CLOCKWORK

* Next-gen visual novel: go where you want, when you want, and say what you want.
* Simulated story-world: other characters move and act independently, remembering everything they see and hear - and everything you do.
* Every minute counts: you have one school day to escape punishment. The clock is always ticking!
* Who can you trust? Some characters are friendly and some are out to get you. Who will you befriend? Who will you betray?

HIGHLY REPLAYABLE

* Every run is different, with new leads and new opportunities for mayhem. 
* Avoiding expulsion is just the start. Can you rise to the position of Head Girl? 
* Mysteries abound. Why is the cellar locked? What is your best friend's dark secret? 

One play-through lasts about 30 - 45 minutes, but achieving that perfect run will take a lot longer...

SOMEONE HAS TO TAKE THE FALL
70010000090692.intro: A Prefect has been attacked. Everyone's blaming YOU. Can you find the real culprit? Mystery adventure with a wicked twist, from the creators of Overboard!
70010000090692.name: Expelled!

70010000092615.description:
Barb the cactus has lost her positive affirmations! How will she get through the day? How will she face her fears? How will she defeat King Cloudy and his evil henchmen? I have no idea. Maybe you should play this gravity-bending platforming adventure and find out?

• An all-new platforming adventure from the creator of Dadish
• Walk all over the walls, ignore gravity, who cares
• Lots of positive affirmations to find
• 100 levels
• 5 bosses
• Questionable therapy
• Secrets to unlock
• Controller support
• Funky tunes
• Rad graphics
• Face your fears
• Have a nice day
70010000092615.name: Be Brave, Barb

70010000093589.description:
Alehouse Tavern Simulator invites you into a vibrant fantasy world where your tavern is more than just a gathering place—it's the heart of your adventure! As the tavern keeper, you’ll manage daily life while diving into thrilling activities and exploring the magical surroundings.

Fish in nearby streams, hunt in the wilderness, tend to your small farm, raise pigs and chickens for fresh ingredients, and harvest vegetables from your own garden to craft delicious meals and brews that delight your patrons. Chop wood to fuel your kitchen and keep the tavern warm and inviting for your guests.

Enemies won’t always respect the peace of your establishment. Creatures may target your tavern, and you’ll need to defend it. Take on quests, equip yourself with weapons, and protect your patrons and livelihood from harm.

Whether you're whipping up a legendary stew, chopping wood like a lumberjack on a mission, or fending off bandits who clearly didn’t read the “no fighting in the tavern” sign, Alehouse Tavern Simulator serves up endless charm and adventure. Will you become the kingdom's most beloved tavern keeper? Or will you just end up with a lot of angry chickens and broken mugs? The choice is yours—pour yourself an ale and get to it!
70010000093589.intro: Serve Ale, Grow Crops, and Defend Your Fantasy Tavern!
70010000093589.name: Alehouse Tavern Simulator

70010000080342.description:
Arise from the abyss of death to reclaim your rightful throne in a captivating action platformer. Assume the mantle of the 'Cursed King,' wielding the chains that once imprisoned you, now transformed into formidable weapons to vanquish your enemies and navigate the perilous terrain of your shattered kingdom. Discover hidden areas, solve puzzles, and uncover secret treasures to feed your power as you prepare for epic battles against gruelling, colossal bosses. Level up strategically to overcome all who stand in your way and take your seat as the rightful king once more!

Arise From The Dead & Claim Back Your Throne!
Assume the mantle of the ‘Cursed King’ as you embark on a relentless journey of vengeance to reclaim your stolen throne. Traverse perilous lands fraught with danger as you hunt for the scattered fragments of celestial arrows, combining them to purge your curse and unlock your true power.

Wield The Chains That Once Imprisoned You!
Embrace your newfound strength and command over the chains that once bound you deep within the crypts. Harness this mighty weapon to repel, slash, and eviscerate any who dare obstruct your path. Utilise your chains further for navigation, attaching to rings and propelling across chasms to reach new areas.

Discover Hidden Areas & Reclaim Your Kingdom’s Treasures
Explore every inch of your crumbling kingdom, uncovering hidden chambers and clandestine passages teeming with invaluable treasures. Acquire newfound abilities and enhancements as you delve deeper, fortifying yourself for the trials that await.

Collect Crystals & Items To Feed Your Power!
Uncover elusive ""power crystals"" and harness their essence to strategically enhance your abilities, gaining an edge on the looming challenges ahead.

Banish Colossal Demons From Your Lands!
Test your strategic finesse and precise timing in intense battles that demand skilful manoeuvring to overcome gruelling, gigantic bosses. 

A Classic Is Revived! Beyond The Ice Palace Returns!
Witness the triumphant resurrection of a cult classic over 35 years in the making!
70010000080342.intro: Wield the chains that once imprisoned you!
70010000080342.name: Beyond the Ice Palace 2

70010000082007.description:
An all-new installment!
Leap into your kart and jump into the fastest poultry race of all time. This ultimate championship title chase offers you a brand new racing experience,  with improved driving physics, revised cartoon graphics and head-over-wheels loops, alongside crossplay and online multiplayer too.

Full speed, awesome action!
•  Criss-cross and drive head-over-heels through the Crazy Chicken universe: discover 12 adventurous tracks with unique challenges and hidden shortcuts.
• Configure your karts and use all kinds of tricks to gain the upper hand over your opponents! Choose from 12 new and revised items, such as the tried and tested 16 ton weight.
• Compete against crazy chickens and other well-known characters to prove you're the fastest driver around. There's even a new character - Midnight, the friendly bat.
• Now with cross-platform online multiplayer for up to 8 players, letting you connect with your friends, or find new rivals from the community.
• Local multiplayer:  play with up to 4 players on a single screen and experience the racing spectacle together.
• Single player and Grand Prix modes against AI opponents.
70010000082007.intro: The world's craziest chicken is heading back to the racetrack!  Wacky characters, cool tracks and karts, and zany items await in a worldwide online battle for first place!
70010000082007.name: Moorhuhn Kart 4

70010000085645.description: Welcome to the Mini Football Cup, the ultimate test of skill and strategy! Compete in 4 competitive leagues and take on 3 exciting tournaments to prove your dominance on the field. Customize your tactics, upgrade your team in the shop, and refine your formations to outplay your opponents. Every match brings new challenges—do you have what it takes to rise to the top and claim the championship? Step onto the pitch and show the world your football skills!
70010000085645.intro: Join the Mini Football Cup! Upgrade your team, refine your tactics, and become a champion!
70010000085645.name: MINI FOOTBALL CUP

70010000085965.description:
A new iteration of a long beloved cross-dressing series boasting 10+ years makes its Nintendo Switch™ debut!
Witness the most gorgeous cross-dressing girl's love story ever made in thoroughly animated glory!

[Story]
Our story takes place in a private school known as Ayanohara Academy.

A secluded flower garden where affluent young gentlemen dress and act as ladies to become "he-iresses", form sisterly bonds with one another, and allow their quasi-romantic relationships to flourish...
New transfer student Iori however, our non-affluent background having protagonist, rejects these ways in an effort to stay true to himself, then quickly finds himself at odds with Mikage, the tyrannical student council president and cross-dressing purist.
The strong willed rebel Iori, and the zealous cross-dressing loyalist Mikage. Their fateful meeting soon unleashes upon them a new forbidden world of cross-dressing girl's love!

[Characters]
- Iori Kido CV: Yuika
The Protagonist surprised by how well women's clothes suit him. Referred to by some students as "The Goddess of Black Camellia", he stumbles into becoming the beautiful envy of his peers.

-Mikage Ayanohara CV:Ren Sagami
The elegant looking yet black-hearted wealthy he-iress. A powerful presence even among the many affluent students around her, she is a member of the elite family that owns the school. Her beauty and elegance as a cross-dressing he-iress earned her the second name, "The White Lily Fairy".
*The main heroine of this game!

- Reona Murasaki CV:Kagome Shiotani
Due to his refined appearance, charisma, and noble background, he is specially permitted to play a male prince-like role at the school. Having quickly become close friends with Iori, he looks out for him and helps him out in every way he can.

- Mahiro Senjuin CV: Ryouko Tezuka
The delinquent gyaru he-iress who rejects the established traditions of her strict buttoned-up family. Doesn't particularly want to dress as a woman, so she chooses to dress as a delinquent one as a form of passive protest.

- Asuka Senjuin CV: Suzuna
The gorgeous he-iress in ringlets. Referred to as "Empress of the Rose Garden", her immense pride in her own family lineage frequently becomes a point of contention between her and Mikage.

- Shizuka Kiriyama CV: Marina Ohno
Iori and Reona's childlike homeroom teacher. She is highly popular among students for her extremely cute un-teacher-like appearance and utterances.
70010000085965.intro:
Cute girls (male) in motion at long last!
A girl's love visual novel game with a cross-dressing twist made to shatter the reader's current worldview to pieces.
70010000085965.name: Trap Yuri Garden

70010000088134.description:
ONE BUTTON BOSSES
Push. Tap. Bash:A 4 hour campaign, a concise roguelike game mode and just one button.
Heart-pumping Strategy: It’s harder than it looks; pilots better be ready for a fight! Unlock upgrades and customize your ship to win.
The Grind: Brag to your friends, laugh at enemies, and compete for the best times on the leaderboard.
Get in The Zone: A legendary synth-wave soundtrack accompanies pilots' many, many losses.
Rise up and Resist: Follow the story of Ace, an unpaid assistant, as they resist the big bosses for a fair paycheck.
Play Your Way: Each of the bosses needs to be beaten in a best of 3, 5, 7 … meaning you will never be hard stuck on a boss fight as there is always a different level to try.

THE SHIP
You pilot a ship that orbits the BOSS automatically. PRESS the button to change the ship’s direction. But the less you change directions, the faster the ship goes. The faster you go, the faster you shoot. The faster you shoot, the faster you WIN! Make sure to WIN before the BOSS gets too angry and wipes you out!

CUSTOMIZE ATTACKS
There's depth to the simple controls! You can customize the ship, mixing ATTACK and MOVEMENT upgrades to find the best builds to beat bosses. DASH instead of changing directions, fire a LASER instead of bullets. There’s over 100 different combinations you can try out to suit your playstyle!

A MEAN STORY
ACE THE ASSISTANT will loop you into the 50 handcrafted levels of bullet hell action. The bosses will taunt you as you lose, but if you persist you will rise up the ranks, progress the story, earn GRIND POINTS and unlock new ways to play! Are you ready?

ROGUELITE R&D (RIFTS & DEVELOPMENTS)
Fly your ship into the R&D (RIFTS & DISCOVERIES) department. Where you will face insanely challenging RANDOMLY GENERATED BOSSES and earn new upgrades and power-ups after every fight.
70010000088134.intro: It's One Button Bosses, it's all in the name. You have one button. There are big bosses to beat. Push, tap, and bash in the handcrafted campaign or in the roguelike rifts.
70010000088134.name: ONE BTN BOSSES

70010000089869.description:
This intense top-down twin-stick shooter roguelike immerses players in the chaos of a zombie apocalypse. As a lone survivor, your mission is to navigate procedurally generated levels filled with relentless undead, using a wide arsenal of weapons and unique character abilities to stay alive. Five distinct tilesets and procedural generation ensure that every playthrough presents a new challenge.

Progress continuously as you level up during missions, upgrading and replacing your gear to adapt to rising threats. The game offers a variety of weapons, from shotguns and rifles to explosive options, allowing for flexible combat strategies. Select from multiple characters, each with special abilities that can change the course of battle in critical moments.

With fast-paced twin-stick shooter mechanics, this roguelike demands quick reflexes and strategic thinking for survival. Each run brings upgrades and power boosts, enabling you to evolve into an unstoppable force against the growing zombie threat.

Featuring endless replayability and dynamic challenges, this game is a must-play for fans of roguelikes and zombie action. Between runs, you can upgrade passive abilities to improve your chances of making it through the next fight.

Will you conquer the relentless hordes and reach the safehouse, or succumb to the unforgiving tide of destruction?
70010000089869.intro: Experience a thrilling top-down twin-stick shooter roguelike. Battle zombies, upgrade your gear, and face fresh challenges in every playthrough!
70010000089869.name: Endless Deaths

70010000089973.description:
A Collapsing Empire
During Chongzhen’s Reign (A.D. 1628-1644), land annexation reached unmitigated extremes, the country faced domestic issues and foreign invasions, coinciding with the catastrophic Little Ice Age. After many years of horrid disasters in succession one after another, the Ming court continued to impose inhumane policies resulting in widespread starvation and leading to the rise of multiple rebellions against the court.

A Travelling With Desperados
Liang the bandit, and his companion are commissioned for a job from an unsavory merchant and must escort four girls to a wealthy lord in the city of Luoyang. They must pass through Huazhou, Wenxiang, Shanzhou, and finally reach their destination of Luoyang.
Liang initially believes that the girls he is escorting will be sold to the wealthy lord as adopted daughters to begin a new life. However, one of the four girls named “Sui” reveals the hidden secret of their journey to Luoyang.
The lord is a swine demon who has practiced devouring young ladies for over a thousand years. Every year on his birthday, he dispatches human traffickers to abduct girls from Shan in celebration of his special day. Sui’s sister was among the many who have fallen victim to the demon’s appetite.
Sui is hopeful that Liang will end the escort and join her in assassinating the swine demon to avenge her sister, and those who have perished in recent years. Although Liang wants to believe Sui, there are too many inconsistencies in her story. Throughout the journey, Liang will gather information, unravel the truth, and make his decisions accordingly.
70010000089973.intro: Trek across ancient China in a dark, boundary-pushing visual novel inspired by traditional Chinese art with modern animation.
70010000089973.name: The Hungry Lamb

70010000090908.description:
Pioneers against aliens! JustAxe is an exciting 2D platformer with puzzles, interactive environments and unusual setting! Solve riddles, combine your moves, and set out to save your hometown and possibly all of humanity... And don’t forget to take your axe with you!

About the game:

The game takes place in the distant future on planet Earth. The small town of New Soviets, hidden in the forest behind mountains, picturesque panel houses and power transmission towers, lives quietly and peacefully, trying to recreate the nearly mythical pages of communist history of the past.

But one day, the tranquillity of the citizens is disturbed by a mysterious invasion of creatures from another world. The hostile creatures have kidnapped the main heroine’s sister. Some time later, she receives a mysterious letter, the author of which seems to know how to resolve the situation... Grab your great-grandfather’s trophy axe and go on an adventure! 

Game features:

Puzzles and interaction with the environment: there’s no telling what difficulties await you behind the next tree, but the pioneer is always prepared! Use the clues and possibilities of the environment to solve riddles and overcome obstacles that stand in your way.
Varied gameplay and mechanics: find new ways to use the weapons available to you, skillfully combine your moves, create unique tactics, and gain access to unexplored areas.
Various locations: from forests, mountains and waterfalls to a dark alien dimension. Navigate through winding paths and mazes, dodge traps, or flee from pursuit and stumble upon artefacts recreated by the residents of New Soviets.
Loyal companion: discover new abilities and stashes in the most unexpected places with the help of a new friend. Don’t forget to return to previous levels, who knows where the treasure might be buried!

Funny dialogues and unexpected ending: you will travel in a colourful but dangerous world. Unlock all the secrets of this amazing universe, pass the trials and find out if a little girl with an axe can save an entire town and find the reason behind the emergence of dangerous monsters?
70010000090908.name: JustAxe

70010000091589.description:
One fateful day, without any warning, the labyrinthine city of Orario was transformed.
In the sunken Orario, Bell and his group follow the trail of the characters as dictated in the heroic tale.
What they find there are an abundance of thoughts and feelings not depicted in "Fullland of Water and Light".

A story tracing the hero's trials and truth now unfolds...

Control Bell Cranel or Ais Wallenstein in this side-scrolling RPG, defeating monsters and advancing through stages to complete the story!
70010000091589.intro: A story tracing the hero's trials and truth now unfolds...
70010000091589.name:
Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon?
~Fullland of Water and Light~

70010000091700.description:
Discover the new hit game from the developers of FRAG Pro Shooter!

BEAST is a high-energy Hero Shooter delivering quick, action-packed battles. Switch seamlessly between your powerful MECHA and agile PET as you explore an epic story mode or dive into intense multiplayer matches. Choose from a wide variety of heroes and engage in explosive, strategic combat – perfect for players seeking a fast, accessible, and thrilling challenge!

- Uncover the heroes' stories in an all-new story mode. Embark on thrilling missions, explore stunning planets, meet unforgettable characters, and immerse yourself in a captivating narrative that brings the world of BEAST to life!

- Engage in a thrilling 3v3 multiplayer hero shooter where each match delivers quick and intense action with powerful Mechas! Choose your favorite character and dive into quick, action-packed games that offer easy, pick-up-and-play fun. BEAST offers a light-hearted, laid-back experience open to anyone, boasting quick matches full of excitement!

- Experience a dynamic dual gameplay system. Switch seamlessly between your powerful MECHA for brute strength and your agile PET for nimble tactics, each offering unique skills that bring versatility and depth to every match! Seamless transitions and sharp strategy will turn the tide in your favor!

- Choose from a roster of unique heroes, each with their own special abilities and playstyles. Whether you prefer heavy firepower, quick strikes, or strategic defense, there’s a hero that fits your gameplay and adds a new dimension to every battle!

- Skill matters most, not your wallet! With no microtransactions, BEAST guarantees a fair and balanced playing field for your progression where your abilities and achievements drive your success. It’s all about your skills, strategy, and teamwork!

- New challenges, content, and game modes are added regularly, ensuring there's always something fresh to experience in the BEAST arena!
70010000091700.intro: JUMP INTO THE BEAST, SWITCH BETWEEN YOUR POWERFUL MECHA AND AGILE PET, AND DOMINATE THE BATTLEFIELD IN THIS FAST-PACED HERO SHOOTER !
70010000091700.name: BEAST: Bio Exo Arena Suit Team

70010000091715.description:
Have you ever wondered how terrifying snails are? They stalk their prey slowly but mercilessly. You can't hide from them. They'll find you anywhere. Even years from now. 

Eat these little people and grow. Grow and eat more. They're just your food. No pity. They are a slow instrument of death!  

Or would you like to try your hand at being a human and attacking these evil slugs? At first you will have to escape, but gradually you will be able to attack these monsters and clear the levels. Everything in this world is unpredictable. Pick a side in this eternal conflict and win!      

Check out the new fun game from the NOSTRA.GAMES team. 

Choose your side in this epic confrontation!
70010000091715.intro: Let the battle between snails and humans begin!
70010000091715.name: Snails vs Humans

70010000092580.description:
ESCAPE SITE 13 immerses players in a shadow-laden, side-scrolling adventure inspired by the enigmatic lore of SCP containment. Set in an original universe, it draws subtle inspiration from SCP-1730 while spinning its own uniquely dark and captivating narrative.

Step into the role of investigator, tasked with exploring the recently unearthed structure known as "Site 13." As you navigate its foreboding corridors, you will:
Unearth forgotten documents that hold the key to its mysteries.
Solve ancient puzzles designed to protect its hidden truths.
Unravel a labyrinthine history buried in the darkness for far too long.

As the team ventures deeper into the darkness of Site 13, they encounter horrors beyond comprehension. With its immersive storytelling and richly detailed world-building, ESCAPE SITE 13 invites both veteran SCP enthusiasts and newcomers to delve into the chaos of a secret too dangerous to remain concealed.
70010000092580.intro: Immerse yourself and uncover an SCP-style mysterious event! Are you ready to face the inexplicable and surreal phenomena?
70010000092580.name: ESCAPE SITE 13

70010000092816.description:
Ringo’s Roundup is a cute pathfinding puzzle game where you plan the route of Pustbunny Ringo’s car by placing various Effect Tiles on the environment.

Ringo’s mission is simple - to pick up all the envelopes and drop them off at the mailbox. You have an important task here as this Postbunny will not get far without your help!

In your hands you will have a variety of Effect Tiles which, when placed, will control what Ringo’s car does and where it goes. You’ll be able to make Ringo turn, make his car jump, teleport, and more!

Each level is handcrafted and might require more than just the most obvious solution. As a Postbunny guide you might need to think outside the box and combine many of the Effect Tiles together.

Are you ready to help Ringo with his mail deliveries?

IN RINGO’S ROUNDUP YOU CAN EXPECT:
- 100+ handcrafted pathfinding & route planning puzzle levels
- Simple to understand mechanics with a surprising amount of depth
- Multiple solutions for many levels (bonus objectives)
- Unlockable color options for Ringo's car
- Relaxing, cozy atmosphere
- Colorful, stylized graphics with tons of personality
- Cute Postman Bunny! :3
70010000092816.intro: Postbunny Ringo on duty! In this pathfinding puzzle game mail delivery is the #1 priority!
70010000092816.name: Ringo's Roundup

70010000092992.description:
The Japanese kanji “生” has multiple readings depending on the word it appears in.

This four-choice quiz game lets you enjoy learning its various pronunciations!

・誕生（birth）
・生る（bear fruit）
・生憎（unfortunately）

…and many more!

Explore the depth of Japanese kanji and expand your knowledge while having fun!
70010000092992.intro:
The Many Readings of the Japanese Kanji “生”
Learn Them Through a Fun Quiz!
70010000092992.name: QUIZ 50 Ways to Read the KANJI 生

70010000093050.description:
Immerse yourself in the vibrant world of K-pop and discover 12 talented boys who dream of fame.

Each one has their own personality, aspirations, and style, but they all share one goal: to shine on stage.

Can you make them fall for you before their big debut takes them away forever?

Game Features:
-12 boys, 12 unique styles
From the shy and sweet to the charismatic leader, each aspiring idol has their own charm and challenges.
Discover what makes them tick and how to win their hearts.

-Dynamic conversations and strategic flirting
Talk to them, send messages, earn their trust, and plan the perfect date.
Will you be their number one fan or the love of their life?

-Affinity meter
Your choices will influence how they feel about you.
Can you make their hearts beat to the rhythm of your words?

-Multiple endings
Will you win over your favorite boy, or will you end up in the dreaded friend zone?
Every decision leads to a different story.

-30 days to conquer stardom (and their hearts)
Time is running out. Every interaction and every word matters.


Do you have what it takes to steal the hearts of future K-pop stars and become their inspiration?

Find out in this adventure filled with romance, music, and unexpected twists!
70010000093050.intro: Conquer the Hearts of Future K-pop Stars in 30 Days!
70010000093050.name: K-pop Idols Dating: Anime Love for B.SeveT

70010000093055.description:
Immerse yourself in the vibrant world of K-pop and discover 12 talented girls who dream of fame.

Each one has her own personality, aspirations, and style, but they all share one goal: to shine on stage.

Can you make them fall for you before their big debut takes them away forever?

Game Features:
-12 girls, 12 unique styles: From the sweet and shy girl to the explosive diva, each aspiring idol has her own charm and challenges. Discover what makes them tick and how to win their hearts.

-Dynamic conversations and strategic flirting: Talk to them, send messages, earn their trust, and plan the perfect date. Will you be their number one fan or the love of their life?

-Affinity meter: Your choices will influence how they feel about you. Can you make their hearts beat to the rhythm of your words?

-Multiple endings: Will you win over your favorite girl, or will you end up in the dreaded friend zone? Every decision leads to a different story.

-30 days to conquer stardom (and their hearts): Time is running out. Every interaction and every word matters.


Do you have what it takes to steal the hearts of future K-pop queens and become their inspiration?

Find out in this adventure filled with romance, music, and unexpected twists!
70010000093055.intro: Conquer the Hearts of Future K-pop Stars in 30 Days!
70010000093055.name: K-pop Idols Dating: Anime Love for PinkOrbil T.

70010000093359.description:
An exploration-type action game depicting one young girl's journey to become a mage!

Freely explore huge open worlds!
Outside heroine Lily's hometown, you'll find all sorts of expansive lands. Make the leap to venture through East Village, Oak Forest, Hidden Cave, Dragon Ridge, Zalam Kingdom, and more. The order in which you proceed is up to you! Travel the world in search of new discoveries!

Battle ferocious foes!
Beware of mighty monsters and vile villains. Orc lords, assassins, sirens, and wicked dragons await you in battle. Gain experience through combat, defeating strong enemies to help Lily grow as a mage.

Power-up with magic and gear!
Use the magic and gear you acquire on your adventures to strengthen Lily!
・Master magic for each of the four elements—fire, ice, wind, and lightning—each with their own strengths and weaknesses. 
・Make full use of support magic to breathe underwater, guard against missiles, and sacrifice HP to recover MP.
・Collect gear to enhance Lily's magical powers, defense powers, and more.

Joined by a loyal companion and mini-dragon!
Magical training can be a difficult journey, but Lily has a powerful companion to help her along the way: a mini-dragon who will lend you support during travel and battle. Plus, learn a range of skills by obtaining training books.

Jump into a world of magic and adventure with Witchroid Vania!
70010000093359.intro: Join mage-in-training Lily on an epic adventure! Explore a multitude of worlds, including forests, deserts, and dungeons, in hopes of becoming a full-fledged mage!
70010000093359.name: Witchroid Vania: A Magical Girl’s Fantastical Adventures

70010000093380.description:
Dive into intense hack-and-slash action as you battle through hordes of enemies in this exciting platformer! Explore worlds filled with dungeons, get powerful loot, and unlock a vast arsenal of weapons and skins.

Game Features:
● Extensive Arsenal & Customization
Choose from a wide variety of weapons, skins, abilities, and pets!
● Dynamic Dodging & Dashing
Master swift dashes to evade enemy melee and ranged attacks.
● Hidden Secrets
Discover multiple secret areas in every level, packed with treasures.
● Expert Combat Mechanics
Parry melee attacks with precision and deflect projectiles using your trusty sword!
● Special Abilities
Your sword is more than a weapon—unleash unique special abilities to take down enemies.
● Engaging Enemy AI
Enemies are smart enough to react to your movements but reckless enough to fall into your traps!
70010000093380.intro: Embark on an epic adventure in Apple Knight 2! An action-packed platformer across a sprawling kingdom with multiple worlds.
70010000093380.name: Apple Knight 2

70010000093568.description:
Cashier Simulator: Manage Your Own Market!
Are you ready to dive into the world of retail and manage your own grocery store? With Cashier Simulator, you can create, expand, and lead your dream market to ultimate success! From stocking shelves with the best products to managing checkout lines, every decision is in your hands. Can you build the best grocery store in town?

Build and Expand:
Start with a small, humble market and transform it into a bustling grocery store empire. Buy new shelves, hire employees, and expand your floor space to accommodate more products and customers.

Customer Satisfaction:
Keep your customers happy by ensuring your shelves are always stocked, your prices are competitive, and your service is top-notch. Handle customer complaints, manage queues, and make sure everyone leaves with a smile.

Product Management:
Choose from a wide variety of products to keep your shelves full. From fresh produce to household items, ensure you have what your customers need. Monitor sales trends and adjust your inventory to maximize profits.

Upgrade and Customize:
Upgrade your equipment and customize your store to make it stand out. Invest in better checkout counters, faster restocking shelves, and even decorate your market with unique themes to attract more customers.

Daily Challenges and Rewards:
Complete daily challenges to earn rewards and improve your market. Special events and seasonal sales offer unique opportunities to boost your revenue and customer satisfaction.

Realistic Simulation:
Experience a realistic supermarket environment with detailed graphics and dynamic gameplay. Manage everything from employee schedules to special promotions and seasonal sales.

Strategic Decisions:
Make strategic decisions to optimize your market’s performance. Decide on pricing strategies, marketing campaigns, and even how to handle competitors.

Why You'll Love Cashier Simulator:
Cashier Simulator offers an engaging and immersive experience that allows you to build and manage your own grocery store. Whether you enjoy strategy games, management simulations, or simply love the idea of running a store, this game offers endless fun and challenges. With its realistic mechanics, detailed graphics, and a wide range of customization options, Cashier Simulator is the ultimate retail management game.
70010000093568.name: Cashier Simulator

70010000093769.description:
Content Warning: Scary Filming is a co-op horror game where you and your friends embark on a spine-chilling adventure to film terrifying content and go viral. Customize your face with the quirky ASCII face customizer, then dive into the unknown with your team. Armed with only your camera, you'll explore creepy environments filled with physics-driven monsters, cursed relics, and other horrifying discoveries.

Film as many terrifying moments as you can before you run out of battery, oxygen, or—worst of all—friends. After surviving the dangers, head back to the surface and watch your chaotic footage rack up views. The more terrifying content you capture, the more famous you become. Use your earnings to upgrade your gear, buy props, and unlock sponsorships to grow your fame even further.

Can you survive the horrors and make a name for yourself, or will you become just another spooky story?
70010000093769.intro: Film the fright, survive the night!
70010000093769.name: Content Warning: Scary Filming

70010000094119.description:
This game is a drone simulation game that allows you to experience real drone flight based on footage shot by a real flying drone. 
There is no up, down, left or right direction control, only the control to increase or decrease the drone speed. 
You can also change the drone's flight mode from Normal, Sport, and Eco to any of the 3. 

Enjoy the beautiful scenery of Ganghwa-do, Korea with "Real" footage! 
This work takes place in Ganghwa-do. 
There are a total of 5 flight courses. 
1080P high-definition footage faithfully reproduces the atmosphere of real nature, providing a strong sense of immersion in the game. 
Smooth and realistic video playback makes you feel like you are a real drone pilot. 
Large capacity! You can fly to 5 locations that show the beautiful scenery of Korea! 
Two play modes are supported: course-specific flying mode and view mode automatic flight. There is also an achievement system. 
Visit Ganghwa-do, Korea from home at any time! 
Enjoy the drone flight control experience and the beautiful natural scenery.
70010000094119.intro: A simulation game where you directly operate a drone based on actual drone flight footage!
70010000094119.name: Korean Drone Flying Tour Ganghwa-do

70010000094175.description:
Embark on a serene journey through Hike Haven, a visually stunning exploration game that invites you to uncover the beauty of nature and history. Wander through two handcrafted, picturesque levels, each brimming with hidden locations to discover. From the rustic charm of a blacksmith’s forge to the towering elegance of windmills, every step brings a new story waiting to be found.

With breathtaking landscapes, relaxing gameplay, and immersive atmospheric design, Hike Haven is the perfect escape into a world of peaceful discovery. Lace up your boots and set out on an unforgettable adventure—only on Nintendo Switch™

Key Features:

Explore Two Beautiful Open-World Levels full of secrets and landmarks
Discover Unique Locations like blacksmiths, windmills, and more
Stunning Graphics & Relaxing Atmosphere for a truly immersive experience
Perfect for Exploration Lovers – no rush, just adventure at your own pace
70010000094175.intro: Hike Haven – A Breathtaking Exploration Adventure!
70010000094175.name: Hike Haven

70050000054133.description: Unlocks “Bonus Story: The Girl Who Cried Ghost”! Clear the story to add the Girl (Kotomo) from Yomawari: Night Alone to your party!
70050000054133.name: Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero - Bonus Story: The Girl Who Cried Ghost

70050000054134.description: Unlocks “Bonus Story: The Rat Who Demons Fear”! Clear the story to add Mad Rat & Heart from Mad Rat Dead to your party!
70050000054134.name: Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero - Bonus Story: The Rat Who Demons Fear

70070000026980.description:
Game Features:
+ 10 characters, 220 skills, 180 talents, over 400 equipments, and more than 200 equipment affixes. Plus, endless stage challenges that never stop!

+ Idle Gameplay: Enjoy a laid-back, stress-free experience where the game truly helps you unwind and relax. Even when you're taking a break, your devils will keep fighting, ensuring you continue to grow stronger.

+ Rich Loot and Equipment System:
During battles, every enemy you defeat has a chance to drop equipment. The equipment quality is determined by the stage level and treasure rank, with higher-quality equipment offering more diverse affixes. There’s even a chance to obtain exclusive, rare affixes to supercharge your power in combat!
70070000026980.intro: Summon your devils to form the ultimate devil squad! Watch your power grow every moment, even when you're away! Are you ready to become the new Devil King?
70070000026980.name: Idle Devils (Deluxe Edition)

70010000087846.description: Get ready to hit the road in Public Transport Simulator 2! Take the driver's seat and experience the thrill of navigating through bustling city streets, challenging routes, and diverse buses. From picking up passengers at designated stops to mastering tricky maneuvers, this immersive simulation game offers a realistic and exciting journey into the world of bus transportation. Can you navigate through traffic, manage your schedule, and become the ultimate bus driver?
70010000087846.name: Public Transport Simulator 2

70010000091245.description:
Race head-to-head in the exciting world of HYPER MIRROR RUN. Compete locally against your friends or challenge an AI opponent. 

You can navigate through mirrored worlds, mastering precision jumps and wielding weapons to triumph over foes. Dive into this 2D platformer for fast-paced action and a lot of fun!

Will you be able to conquer every challenge, vanquish enemies, and face powerful bosses at the end of each of the 5 unique worlds?

Don’t forget to collect the gems to earn extra lives, enhancing your chances to defeat your opponent.


Features:
* 55 Engaging Levels: Traverse meticulously designed levels across 5 distinct worlds.
* Versus Mode: Compete locally against your friends in thrilling head-to-head matches.
* Single-Player Variety: Choose from 3 difficulty AI levels in single-player mode to tailor the challenge.
* Unique Retro Visuals: Immerse yourself in the captivating retro pixel art and vibrant visual style, choosing from a variety of cute character skins that allow you to express your unique style and flair.
* Precise and Enjoyable Controls: Experience controls that are both precise and enjoyable, allowing you to master every move with finesse.
* Exclusive Soundtrack: Enjoy an engaging gaming experience with an original soundtrack composed for the game, including immersive melodies.
70010000091245.intro: Can you run fast enough to avoid defeat?
70010000091245.name: Hyper Mirror Run

70010000092083.description:
Step into the world of Wine Factory Simulator, where passion meets precision, and every bottle tells a story. Immerse yourself in the tranquil yet rewarding life of a home winemaker, transforming simple grapes into exquisite wines that captivate connoisseurs.
Start your journey by cultivating your own vineyard, carefully selecting grape varieties that will define the character of your wines. Tend to your vines, ensuring they receive just the right balance of sunlight, water, and care. A thriving vineyard is the heart of a great winery!
As the seasons change and the grapes reach perfection, it’s time to harvest and begin the winemaking process. Crush the fruit, initiate fermentation, and patiently oversee every stage of aging, refining the flavor profile to perfection. Your expertise will determine whether your wine becomes a forgettable drink or a sought-after masterpiece.
But winemaking is more than just production—it’s about sharing your passion with the world. Open your winery’s doors, welcome guests, and establish your reputation as a true artisan. Experiment with new grape blends, refine your techniques, and watch as your small, cozy winery transforms into a renowned destination for wine lovers.

Features:
Grape Variety Selection – Choose from a range of grape types, each with unique flavors and qualities.
Vineyard Management – Use tools and machinery to care for your vineyard and ensure the highest quality harvest.
Hands-On Winemaking – Crush, ferment, age, and refine your wines with precision and care.
Sell and Expand – Bottle your creations, sell them to customers, and invest in growing your winery.
Experiment & Innovate – Discover new techniques, refine your recipes, and craft the perfect wine.

Are you ready to build your own winemaking empire? Pour your heart into every bottle and create a legacy that will stand the test of time in Wine Factory Simulator!
70010000092083.intro: Grow, Harvest, Create – The Art of Winemaking Awaits!
70010000092083.name: Wine Factory Simulator

70010000093621.description:
Tiny Lands -  Deluxe Edition is a relaxing 3D game about finding the differences between two handcrafted dioramas. If you are looking for a game that allows you to just sit back and play Tiny Lands is for you!

Tiny Lands - Deluxe Edition includes all DLC worlds:
- Desert mysteries
- City lifestyle
- Warmy christmas
- Traditional food
- Cozy interiors
- Fairy tales
- Fish tanks
- Amusement park
- Pirates

This also includes the “Final Challenge” special world for those who are ready for the ultimate Tiny Lands experience.

Over 100 additional handcrafted dioramas are waiting for you!
70010000093621.intro: Relax and find the differences in beautiful 3D dioramas. With the Deluxe Edition, you can play all the new expansions for Tiny Lands.
70010000093621.name: Tiny Lands - Deluxe Edition

70010000095002.description:
Step into a dreamlike world of pink petals and serene beauty in Sakura Haven, a breathtaking walking simulator where every path leads to wonder.

Wander through a tranquil landscape bathed in soft pink hues, where cherry blossoms dance in the wind and ancient torii gates mark the way to hidden secrets. Explore vibrant shrines, peaceful gardens, and misty hills as you immerse yourself in the soothing sights and sounds of this mesmerizing journey.

With no rush, no danger—just pure exploration—Sakura Haven is the perfect escape into a world of peace and beauty. Let the gentle soundtrack and stunning visuals transport you to a place of serenity.

Features:
Breathtaking Pink World – Walk through a landscape inspired by cherry blossoms and traditional Japanese aesthetics.
Discover Hidden Landmarks – Find ancient torii gates, mystical shrines, and other mesmerizing locations.
Relaxing Atmosphere – A peaceful journey with ambient sounds and a calming soundtrack.
Explore at Your Own Pace – No timers, no stress—just pure exploration.
70010000095002.intro: "Sakura Haven – A Tranquil Journey Through a World of Blooming Beauty"
70010000095002.name: Sakura Haven

70070000025604.description:
Pre-order to receive a Gold Choice Pack and Early Access on March 15, 2025.

This edition of MLB The Show 25 Includes: 
 • 20 The Show Packs
 • 5 Gold Choice Packs
 • 1 20th Anniversary Choice Pack 
 • 1 Diamond Choice Pack
 • 1 Equipment Pack
 • 1 Double Daily Rewards
 • 1 Cover Athlete Bat Skin
 • 20,000 Stubs™

Ignite your passion and build your very own path to greatness—from high school all the way to the Hall of Fame! Along the way, connect with iconic baseball stars in fan-favorite modes – updated with new ways to play.

Road to The Show: 
 • Begin your RTTS journey by playing High School and College games in The Amateur Years.
 • Build the RTTS ballplayer you want, the way you want to. You’re free to edit perks and benefit from revamped Attributes.
 
 Franchise & March to October: 
 • Enjoy every moment of every game – or choose the key moments that matter, now with improvements to both Trade Logic and Defensive WAR. 
 
 Diamond Dynasty
 • Collect and earn player cards in Diamond Dynasty: 360, as you craft your very own lineup – with no more time-limited season restrictions. 
 • Try out Diamond Quest with your squad! It’s a brand-new roguelike game mode, where rewards are yours to earn through moments, boss encounters and more.
 
 Gameplay Improvements and Expansion:
 • Experience exciting new gameplay in all modes: featuring a variety of all-new RTTS Impact Plays, G.O.A.T difficulty for the ultimate challenge, all-new Ambush Hitting for a more realistic “plan of attack” at the plate, faster online gameplay and hundreds of new animations for extreme realism – and much more!
 
 Storylines: 
 • Celebrate history in Storylines while you learn about baseball legends and their amazing tales. 
 
 The Best Gets Better: 
 • Hear authentic High School and College audio—including metal bats and chain link fences—alongside enhanced stadium sound and fan chants, all powered by ShowTech™.
70070000025604.intro: Forge your baseball journey in The Show™
70070000025604.name: MLB® The Show™ 25 - Digital Deluxe Edition

70010000090717.description:
Reclaim the Wild: Forest Ranger Life Simulator
Step into the boots of a dedicated forest ranger and breathe life into nature’s hidden treasures. Your mission is to restore the beauty of a forgotten forest by repairing structures, feeding wildlife, cleaning up trash, and crafting tools—all while exploring a stunning natural world filled with surprises.

Key Features:
	•	Restore & Build: Repair bridges, bird feeders, benches, and more to revitalize the forest.
	•	Wildlife Care: Feed animals, remove traps, and protect their habitat.
	•	Explore & Learn: Discover plants, mushrooms, and animals while reading about real-life nature.
	•	Craft & Create: Turn everyday materials into useful tools and items.
	•	Clean & Sort: Tackle pollution by sorting and recycling trash.
	•	Immersive Gameplay: Experience the forest by day or under a starry night sky.

Shape the future of your forest with your choices. Rebuild, nurture, and protect nature awaits its hero!
70010000090717.intro: Step into nature’s shoes – a ranger’s journey begins!
70010000090717.name: Forest Ranger Life Simulator

70010000094611.description:
Uncover Serenity in the Sands
Dive into the tranquility of the desert with Lost Oasis, a walking simulator that invites you to explore a breathtaking world of golden dunes and lush, hidden oases. Designed for relaxation and discovery, this game offers a meditative experience free of stress, enemies, or time limits.

Key Features:
 Vast Desert World: Roam freely across an expansive, open desert with dynamic lighting and soothing soundscapes.
Discover Hidden Oases: Locate vibrant oases filled with ancient ruins, exotic flora, and whispers of a forgotten world.
Fun Objectives: Embark on a casual quest to find secret landmarks, making every step meaningful.

Whether you play for 10 minutes or lose yourself for hours, Lost Oasis offers a peaceful escape into nature.
70010000094611.intro: Embark on a serene journey through a vast desert, uncovering forgotten oases and hidden mysteries in this relaxing walking simulator.
70010000094611.name: Lost Oasis

70010000093109.description: Dive into an incredibly fast-paced and beautifully crafted retro runner! Control your robot with just a finger to dodge sawblades, flames, and many other dangerous obstacles while flying through an infinite tunnel. Are you ready for the drop? Parachute not included.
70010000093109.intro: Dive into an incredibly fast-paced and beautifully crafted retro runner!
70010000093109.name: Scrap Divers

70010000082774.description:
Pre-order to get the Gold Choice pack. 

This edition of MLB The Show 25 includes:
 • 5 The Show Packs

Ignite your passion and build your very own path to greatness—from high school all the way to the Hall of Fame! Along the way, connect with iconic baseball stars in fan-favorite modes – updated with new ways to play.

Road to The Show: 
 • Begin your RTTS journey by playing High School and College games in The Amateur Years.
 • Build the RTTS ballplayer you want, the way you want to. You’re free to edit perks and benefit from revamped Attributes.
 
 Franchise & March to October: 
 • Enjoy every moment of every game – or choose the key moments that matter, now with improvements to both Trade Logic and Defensive WAR. 
 
 Diamond Dynasty
 • Collect and earn player cards in Diamond Dynasty: 360, as you craft your very own lineup – with no more time-limited season restrictions. 
 • Try out Diamond Quest with your squad! It’s a brand-new roguelike game mode, where rewards are yours to earn through moments, boss encounters and more.
 
 Gameplay Improvements and Expansion:
 • Experience exciting new gameplay in all modes: featuring a variety of all-new RTTS Impact Plays, G.O.A.T difficulty for the ultimate challenge, all-new Ambush Hitting for a more realistic “plan of attack” at the plate, faster online gameplay and hundreds of new animations for extreme realism – and much more!
 
 Storylines: 
 • Celebrate history in Storylines while you learn about baseball legends and their amazing tales. 
 
 The Best Gets Better: 
 • Hear authentic High School and College audio—including metal bats and chain link fences—alongside enhanced stadium sound and fan chants, all powered by ShowTech™.

If you are interested in Early Access and playing 4 days early on March 14th 2025, do not purchase this version and instead purchase the Digital Deluxe Edition.
70010000082774.intro: Forge your baseball journey in The Show™
70010000082774.name: MLB® The Show™ 25

70050000053207.description: This bonus content for MLB The Show 25 includes 15 The Show Packs, 5 Gold Choice Packs, 1 20th Anniversary Choice Pack, 1 Diamond Choice Pack, 1 Equipment Pack, 1 Cover Athlete Bat Skin, 20,000 Stubs™, and Double Daily Rewards. Once acquired, items should be redeemed upon booting the game.
70050000053207.intro: Forge your baseball journey in The Show™
70050000053207.name: Digital Deluxe Edition Bonus Content

70010000083300.description:
Wait... A muscular cat that fights aliens!?

Get ready to enjoy this crazy 2D platformer adventure starring KinnikuNeko! A cat with the body of a bodybuilder who will fight against a big alien army that has invaded planet Earth and captured all its inhabitants. He will be accompanied by his friends Lemon and Keita, who haven't yet been captured by the evil beings from outer space.

- Fun 2D platformer with different mini-games that will change the rhythm of the game. Purr like a kitty or punch with the strength of a school bus.
- Exciting story full of goofy humor, friendship, drama and action. Full of charismatic and unforgettable characters.
- Striking visual style that pays tribute to Japanese anime of the 90s.
- Awesome soundtrack that will empower your journey.
- Discover all the secrets by replaying the levels and finding the hidden objects.
- Nya nya nya nya nyaaaaaaa (meow with a button).

Go through different levels using just your muscles to fight, or climbing like a kitty until you find the way to save humanity.

Watch out! The sleek and ferocious General Pitaya, together with her two minions, will not make it easy for you!

Discover the intentions of this evil civilization in a story full of humor, friendship, drama, and action. All under a visual aesthetic typical of 90s Japanese anime and traditional animation!

Why did the aliens decide to invade Earth?
Why did they capture all the humans?
What brought them here?
But the biggest question... A muscular cat?!
70010000083300.intro: Join KinnikuNeko in this fun 2D platformer and fight against the mysterious alien invasion. A story full of humor, friendship, drama and action. Its aesthetics are a love letter to 90s anime.
70010000083300.name: KinnikuNeko: SUPER MUSCLE CAT

70010000090100.description:
In a future ravaged by mechanized enemies known as the Primordial, one girl named Amor might hold the only key to reclaiming civilization in S. Prysm Destroyer! Amor had fallen in love with a boy whose passion was constructing robots, but when he died, the tragedy left Amor emotionless and the mech he designed has mysteriously grown more hostile. Acting as the mech’s pilot, Amor sets out to wreak havoc on the enemy by drawing power from prysmals, a material from the same comets that seemingly brought the Primordial to Earth.

S. Prysm Destroyer is a side-scrolling 2.5D shooter inspired by run ’n gun genre classics and mecha anime. Blast through enemy hordes and collect elemental power-ups to unleash the awesome potential of Prysm Destroyer attacks. Chase high scores through skillful play and unlock loads of costumes for Amor!

Features:

• Blast through side-scrolling stages in old-school run ’n gun style!
• Immerse yourself in a world and narrative inspired by mecha action classics.
• Collect elemental power-ups to charge the Prysm Destroyer!
• Unlock special costumes to customize your pilot.
• Enjoy anime aesthetics and screen-filling special attacks!
70010000090100.intro: Run ’n gun action meets apocalyptic mecha anime style with a cute heroine as the pilot!
70010000090100.name: S. Prysm Destroyer

70010000091089.description:
EXPLORE THE MANSION
You find yourself trapped inside the mysterious Mystwood Mansion. The door behind you is locked and the only way forward is to delve deeper into the mansion. As you explore the mansion's many rooms you discover that someone has orchestrated a series of puzzles and challenges to keep you from escaping.

SOLVE PUZZLES AND DECIPHER CODES
Each room of the mansion is filled with puzzles to solve and codes to decipher. As you take on the mansion's many challenges someone seems to be watching your every move...

INTERACT WITH THE ENVIRONMENT
Poke around to find clues to help you solve the puzzles. Interact and study 3D objects to find important details.

ESCAPE!
Will you escape the mansion's grasp or are you up to the challenge to access the final room?

FEATURES
• Five puzzle-filled rooms with hidden sub-areas
• Dynamic hint system
• Beautiful and immersive environments to explore
• Many objects and secrets to find
• Multiple endings
70010000091089.intro: Experience a first-person escape room adventure in the mysterious Mystwood mansion. Solve puzzles, crack codes, and uncover hidden secrets to escape!
70010000091089.name: Escape From Mystwood Mansion

70010000088832.description:
The year is 2054. Earth has been destroyed by an intergalactic war between two alien races, and humanity is on the brink of annihilation. A small number of survivors, aboard the USS White Whale, crash land on the vast and untamed planet Mira—and now it falls to you, as a member of BLADE, to help bring humanity back from the edge of extinction…with the aid of powerful giant robots called Skells!

The visually enhanced edition of this open-world RPG contains newly added story elements and more.

The Xenoblade Chronicles™ X: Definitive Edition game is coming to the Nintendo Switch™ system on March 20, 2025!

Take on tough foes in a robust combat system, and pilot powerful giant robots called Skells

Choose from a huge variety of special attacks, skills, and classes in a combat system that’s as deep as you want it to be. Once you’ve proven yourself to BLADE, you’ll earn the right to pilot and personalize your very own Skell—a powerful machine that can fly, transform into a vehicle for fast overland travel, and wield immense strength in combat with customizable weapons and armor.

Gather resources and take on missions to build the community of New Los Angeles

As you go about the reconstruction effort, getting to know the people of New Los Angeles (NLA), you’ll build affinity with your party members and unlock quests for gear and other rewards. Join your choice of military organization within BLADE to take on even more missions—or even team up with up to 32 players from near and far online* in Squad Tasks, Online Missions, and extra-challenging Global Nemesis Battles!
70010000088832.intro: Rebuild humanity on the mysterious planet Mira in this action RPG
70010000088832.name: Xenoblade Chronicles™ X: Definitive Edition

70010000090111.description:
"Dye the Bunny. Ellie, you have to dye the Bunny."
Little Ellie goes on an Easter Egg Hunt, exploring her garden and wandering off a little too far from home, where she meets a mysterious Bunny. Her dad is calling her for dinner already, but she keeps going further into the rabbit hole.
Dye The Bunny is an Easter horror game. Play as a little girl Ellie, exploring the garden, finding Easter eggs, solving the challenges that come your way, surviving the encounters of the Bunny and going down the rabbit hole, where the Bunny lives. Ellie has a little basket to put the Easter eggs into, as well as other things she can find along the way, which is an intuitive inventory system for the player to use. But at the end of it all, Ellie has to do something. Bunny wants to ask Ellie for a favor. Dye the Bunny. Dye the Bunny, Ellie.
The game also features more endings after the game is completed for further exploration, story and a dark twist.
70010000090111.intro: Dye The Bunny is an Easter horror game about little Ellie going on an Easter Egg Hunt down a rabbit hole.
70010000090111.name: Dye The Bunny

70010000090552.description:
Destroy enemy tokens in this modern Ludo. Play it alone, or with friends and family on one device. Roll the dice and go through the entire playing field with all the tokens. Will you come to the home area first?

The main goal of the game is to take all 4 tokens inside the home area before the other opponents. Roll the dice and move forward. Watch out, don't let your opponents kick your token back to their starting position.

Let's roll the dice!
70010000090552.intro: Classic Ludo in a modern design, enhanced with four different themes of tokens and their drastic destruction instead of kicking them.
70010000090552.name: Ludo Party

70010000090963.description:
Your fortress is under constant attack, and you must save everyone who counts on you. Keep the walls strong and keep the mutants from getting inside.

Roll out all the powerful weapons you have and start harvesting the evil souls. No time to think. The waves of zombies can come crashing down all around you. Shoot, reload and repeat. Repeat as many times as necessary to keep everyone safe. 

Clear and protect each level you enter. It's not as easy as you think. The zombies are getting smarter and always looking for new tricks.   

Check out the new fun game from the NOSTRA.GAMES team. 

Become a true hero for your people!
70010000090963.intro: Protect your stronghold in these dark times!
70010000090963.name: Swarm Madness

70010000091033.description:
Are you an English language genius and a terminology expert? If you’re looking for the perfect word game to play - you’ve found it! 

Jumble Quest is a simple and addictive word game where you tap for clues and hints and arrange the given letters to compose a word. You’ll learn how to spell tons of new words and impress all of your friends with your expanding vocabulary! If you’re looking for a new spelling game to challenge yourself with - you’ve found it!

HOW TO PLAY
On each level you will have 6-8 letters to arrange into new words. Tap on the empty word spaces for clues to each word. Connect letters to build words. Tap the question mark for a hint and reveal a letter. If you’re stuck, there are extra hints available. There will many different words for you to compose on each level! Challenge your vocabulary and see how many words you can learn and create with a set of letters!

Guess a hidden word for extra points! Can you solve every word from the hints provided? Spell the correct word with the letters provided a series of pics that combine to create a word or phrase!

Jumble Quest Top Features:
• Play with your friends in PvP mode!
• Spell hidden words for extra points!
• More than 15000 levels.
• Learn new words and build your vocabulary!
• Connect letters to memorize words and become a spelling bee champion!
------------------
How many words can you learn in this challenging word game? This learning game is perfect for all ages. Download Jumble Quest today and start connecting the letters to grow your vocabulary! Jumble Quest will help you excel in your upcoming spelling bee and mind games!

These challenging and fun word connect puzzles will enlighten your day for girls and boys and people of all ages. Play single player or with friends, super fun! Test your vocabulary and see how many words can compose with each new set of letters! The more Jumble Quest that you play, the more words that you will learn and the faster you can build your language skills. Word games are a great way to make learning fun.

• Challenging Learning Guess the Word Game.
• Amazing word guessing Mystery Challenge.
• Vocabulary Brain Exercises with Clues.
• Great Language Hint and Guess Vocabulary game.
70010000091033.intro: Tap, scramble letters, and solve the clues! How many hidden words can you find?!
70010000091033.name: Jumble Quest

70010000091710.description:
Learn to use the boomerang - one of the best and most unique weapons available. Feel the awesome experience and use it for your victories! 

Throw the boomerang at your enemies, trying to choose the best trajectory and speed to cause the most damage. You will see just how dangerous this weapon can be.      

Complete all the levels with this wonderful tool of war and become the most skilled boomerang warrior in the world. Just throw it again and again. It will return to its master each time.  

Check out the new fun game from the NOSTRA.GAMES team. 

Feel the way our ancestors fought!
70010000091710.intro: Try one of the oldest weapons in the world.
70010000091710.name: Boomerang of Destruction

70010000092773.description: IF YOU EVER WANT TO SHOOT HORDES OF EMOJIS? RIGHT INTO THEIR FACES? THAN THIS IS YOUR GAME BUDDY! KILL THE EMOJI is a fast-paced, bombastic, funny and hard survival first-person shooter. Kill as much emojis as you can, try to save the world, but the waves will never end! Enjoy our game while you can let off your infinite pain over the Emoji Movie or your hate for the color yellow. But this game is so universal, basically, everyone can join the fight against the evil emojis! So what are you waiting for? Have fun playing our games you lovely silly humans!
70010000092773.intro: Unleash chaos and blast endless waves of evil emojis in this wild FPS!
70010000092773.name: Kill The Emoji

70010000093287.description:
Tales of Autumn is a wild farming RPG with an emphasis on animals and terrain management. Develop the abandoned ranch, befriend the wildlife, build relationships and earn the trust of the town.


FARMING HANDS
On your ranch, you can befriend and tame wild creatures while raising farm animals, each with their own unique needs. Shape the land to create different biomes, influencing the crops you can grow and the animals that will be drawn to your farm. Traditional livestock can be raised in barns and coops, providing valuable resources and cutsie companionship


A LIVING TOWN
Your choices impact the town—good deeds will earn you rewards, discounts, friendship, and helping hands while neglecting the community will result in your neighbours becoming distant. Build relationships with the townsfolk, learn their stories, and let them become part of your adventure - and what a fantastic adventure it can be!


FISHING & EVENTS
Relax by casting your fishing rod at the docks or lake, complete with fun minigames and a variety of lures. Discover a lively festival calendar, along with unique character and creature events that unfold as you progress.


KEY FEATURES
- Creature Taming – Befriend and care for wild and farm animals, each with specific needs.
- Karma System – The town reacts to your behavior, offering rewards for kindness or keeping their distance if ignored.
- Relationships – Get to know the townsfolk, hear their stories, and invite them into your journey.
- Fishing – Engage in a fishing minigame with different lures.
- Festivals & Events – Take part in town celebrations and creature events.
70010000093287.intro: In Tales of Autumn rebuilding your farm and animal care go hand-in-hand! Befriend chimaeras, help the town, and become the hero of this story!
70010000093287.name: Tales of Autumn

70010000093373.description:
United Assault - Final Stand is an open-world rogue-lite FPS set in the final days of World War II, deep in the Obersalzberg region of Germany, 1945. As the war nears its end, you are part of a daring mission to infiltrate this heavily fortified mountain stronghold, which includes the mountain residence of the Führer himself.

Explore a meticulously recreated landscape based on actual satellite data, scaled and adapted for enhanced gameplay. Navigate through authentic reconstructions of significant locations, including the Berghof—the Führer's mountain residence—along with the Kehlsteinhaus (Eagle's Nest) and an extensive network of bunker complexes. Each location is filled with hidden secrets, requiring tactical navigation and vertical exploration to uncover every detail.

Features:
- Open-world gameplay in a faithfully recreated 1945 Obersalzberg region.
- Vertical exploration with a focus on strategic elevation and tactical advantage.
- Authentic recreations of key historical sites, including the Berghof (the Führer's mountain residence), Kehlsteinhaus, and various bunker complexes.
- Rogue-lite elements with procedurally generated challenges and objectives for endless replayability.
- A vast array of secret locations and hidden areas to discover, adding depth and intrigue to every mission.
- Immersive World War II combat experience with existing weaponry and realistic enemy AI.

Take part in a daring operation to infiltrate and dismantle the final remnants of enemy power in the Führer's mountain stronghold. Your choices and strategy will determine the outcome of this critical mission in the concluding chapter of the United Assault series.
70010000093373.intro: United Assault - Final Stand is an open-world rogue-lite FPS set in 1945 Germany. Infiltrate the Führer's mountain residence, explore secret-filled bunkers, and engage in intense combat.
70010000093373.name: United Assault - Final Stand

70010000093716.intro: A classic board game for fans of strategy and logic in the style of ancient Egypt! Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of ancient pyramids and prove to everyone that you are a real pharaoh!
70010000093716.name: Chess Grandmaster: Ancient Egypt Battle

70050000054276.description:
If you pre-order or purchase* the digital version of the game on Nintendo eShop or My Nintendo Store, you’ll receive an Exploration Support Package containing the following in-game items via automatic download when the game releases:

• 100,000 credits
• Melee weapon: Advanced Iron Knife
• Ranged weapon: Advanced Storm Assault Rifle
• Survival armor: Goggles, Bodywear, Gloves, and Footwear
• Weapon augments: Melee Accuracy Up I, Ranged Accuracy Up I, Melee Attack Up I, Ranged Attack Up I, Theroid Slayer I, Secondary CD Reducer I
• Armor augments: Max HP Up I, Max TP Up I, Evasion Up I, Potential Up I, Physical Resistance Up I

You can get your items by visiting the Customization Center in the BLADE Barracks after Chapter 3.
70050000054276.intro: Pre-order or purchase by April 6, 2025 and jumpstart your adventure with helpful in-game items
70050000054276.name: Exploration Support Package

70010000084571.description:
The 90s hardcore mecha game, exclusive to Japan until now! Assault Suit Leynos 2 is finally making its way to the West, following in the footsteps of Assault Suit Leynos and Assault Suit Valken. Now upgraded with new features and quality-of-life improvements. Suit up and start the assault... again!

The future war
The year is 2123 AD and the Xenes Federation is waging an all-out war against the neighboring Republic of Sanlar. Just one year after the outbreak of the conflict, Sanlar's forces find themselves outnumbered by the military might of the Xenesian army. To address this dire situation, the President of Sanlar issues a special order to the 12th Special Armoured Corps. Despite being comprised of troublemakers and delinquents, this unit, known commonly as the 12th Armoured, is renowned for overcoming even the most insurmountable odds.

It's time to turn the tide.

Non-stop robot action
Assault Suit Leynos 2 is the 32-bit sequel to the 1990 game Assault Suit Leynos (known as Target Earth in the US) for the Sega Mega Drive/Genesis. It's a side-scrolling shooter where players pilot the Leynos assault suit against a relentless mechanized army, featuring a hard-boiled story and robot-anime inspired gameplay. Assault Suit Leynos spawned the beloved spinoff Assault Suit Valken (known as Cybernator) that is set in the same universe. It was released for the Super NES™ in 1992 and is a must-have for every fan of 2D robot action!

A myriad of offensive options
Select your assault suit and arm yourself from a diverse arsenal as you navigate through 7 challenging stages. Tailor your suit's parameters to optimize your performance for success. Unlock more powerful weapons — including previously unattainable ones made available due to modern bug fixes. Experience how your armament choices influence your field of view, with the camera seamlessly zooming in and out. Whether you prefer auto or manual aiming, the choice is yours. Brace yourself for an escalating challenge, as the difficulty level adjusts to spawn increasingly formidable enemies. Are you ready to take on the ultimate test of skill and strategy?

Added modern features
Rewind
Quick Save / Quick Load
Slow Mode
Button Configuration
Rapid Fire
Enhanced Boost Functionality
Increased Durability
Hint Function
And more!
70010000084571.intro: A 2D ACTION MECHA FEST FROM THE PAST!
70010000084571.name: Assault Suit Leynos 2 Saturn Tribute

70010000085991.description:
People gather memories as they live their lives, thus developing their souls. This is the story of a young woman traveling across a ruined continent to find the path toward the future.

The theme of this game is "memory." There are moments when everyone must confront the past and their own memories. All memories, including both successes and failures, become nourishment for the future and help shape people. "Atelier Yumia" tells the story of Yumia and her companions as they follow the path they believe in while being confronted by the memories they discover along the way.

Story:
In a world where alchemy is deemed "taboo," the alchemist Yumia yearns for the truth the lies hidden in a ruined continent. The time has come for her to take the first step on her grand adventure across the continent.

Main features:
- Freely traverse the vast open field in all directions
The continent is an unexplored land where the player can use a wide range of items and actions to forge their path forward.

- Game cycle
Explore the field and gather ingredients in order to synthesize items. The items you create are key to advancing the story and can be used for combat and further exploration. You can also use "Simple Synthesis" to create items while you are out in the field and construct bases using the "Building" feature.

- Create items while out in the field and customize bases however you like!
You can use Simple Synthesis to create exploration tools for opening the path forward, as well as items that will benefit you during combat and synthesis. You can also use the Building feature to construct bases and then decorate them with furniture to your liking.

Note: Please check the official "Atelier Yumia" site for details. Please be aware that other editions containing this product exist. Be careful not to make duplicate purchases.
70010000085991.intro: Walk the forbidden path, no matter where it leads.
